attributes.action: Give the same personal tax allowances to women over 60 who are in receipt of OAP state pension as those over 65yr
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present the higher personal tax allowances received by state pensioners at 65 does not include retired women in receipt of state pension between the ages of 60 and 65. Another unfair tax grab, just like the 10p fiasco, by the present government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
